name: Public school students in grade 8 who have teachers with state certification, more than 5 years of teaching experience, or a degree in mathematics, by student and school characteristics: 2015
description: Public school students in grade 8 who have teachers with state certification, more than 5 years of teaching experience, or a degree in mathematics, by student and school characteristics: 2015

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: State teacher certification indicates that the teacher holds a regular or standard teaching certificate that is valid in the state in which he or she is currently teaching. Years of teaching experience include all years worked as an elementary or secondary school teacher. A degree in mathematics indicates that the teacher has an undergraduate or graduate major or minor in mathematics.
sources: Rahman T, Fox MA, Ikoma S, and Gray L, Certification Status and Experience of U.S. Public School Teachers: Variations Across Student Subgroups, NCES 2017-056 (2017).Science and Engineering Indicators
